name: Dad Simulator (RossyRoo)
description: Use the directional keys to move your dad around the map. Collect food and fun items to bring to your daughter in order to increase your KID RESPECT. Earn DOLLARS so you don't get EVICTED by working at your COMPUTER. Trade off with your friends when the DAD changes during different parts of the day. Crank up that difficulty in the start menu if the game gets too easy. Have fun!
